Name: Heavy Hitter
Text: When you use a Strength Action, roll 2d6. If you roll a 12, double all damage from that Action.

Name: Pushback
Text: When you deal damage to a target, you can push them 1 Zone away from you.

Name: Indomitable
Text: You have 13 Health per Level. This replaces Hearty.

Name: Critikill Roll
Text: When doing a Competing Roll in combat, you can choose to deal (PIB) damage to the character you're rolling against.'
